wiki.content:
"Now" is the first single from Paramore's 4th selftitled album, which will be released on April 9th of 2013. The single was released on January 22th of 2013, with a pack of special editions of the album, preorders, and digital features. It will be the first album they record since the departure of the Farro brothers.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.

It will be the first album they record since the departure of the Farro brothers.

track.name: Now
comments: oh my god, the drums, they are so great [2] and the chorus wow
oh my god, the drums, they are so great
The begining sounds like No Doubt's "Sixteen".
LOST THE BATTLE, WIN THE WAR ♥ [2]
how i love this song so damn muchhhhh
Still gets more and more epic with each listen [2]
LOST THE BATTLE, WIN THE WAR ♥
sounds like No Doubt actually... not a bad song, a grower. Interesting in any case. I am fond of it somehow.
Still gets more and more epic with each listen
nice bass and drum work. sounds good on my soundsystem
The pre-chorus - "Lost the battle, but win the war" - is incredible. [2]
